name: Bingus
description:
In this little mobile game it is your task to look after a 'Bingus', a strange catlike creature with many appearences.

This game is still a huge work in progress, but I want to make a Tamagotchi inspired game for the fun of it! So far all you can really do is watch Bingus and feed Bingus, but I'm still working on this.
